value:
$WmMPID_エフラム,ch08_01_Eirik_FM_Pair,Face|The forest seems to have gotten
rather thick... That will help us
shake whoever pursues us.$k$pLet's hurry, Eirika. We should keep
going so we can keep what distance
we have.$k$p$nMPID_比翼エイリーク|Do you really think we'll be able to
make it back to the castle, Ephraim?$k$pIt feels like that woman who captured
us is still watching us somehow...$k$p$nMPID_エフラム|She said her name was Thórr, right?
Her martial ability was impressive,
I'll admit that...$k$pIt's difficult to believe that was power
a mortal could wield.$k$pStill, whoever the opponent, I do not
intend to lose.$k$p...All right, let's wade into the water
here and make our way upstream.$k$p$nMPID_比翼エイリーク|But...won't we get wet?$k$p$nMPID_エフラム|Yes, but the water will erase any
tracks we leave. We'll travel upstream
for a while, then cross.$k$pThat should give any pursuer trouble
following us. Now, let's get going.$k$p$nMPID_比翼エイリーク|R-right!$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_トール,ch00_22_Tor_F_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|Heh... They may be young, but they
are no fools. They are worthy of my
trial, meant only for the truly strong.$k$p

$WmMPID_幼少ヒーニアス,ch08_03_Heanius_M_Before21,Face|If the sun is there... West has to be
this way. We must be nearly halfway
through the afternoon.$k$pBased on the amount of time that
has passed since we were captured,
Castle Frelia should be...$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ターナ,ch08_05_Turner_F_Before21,Face|Innes, look! Over there! I think
I saw a structure in that direction.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ヒーニアス,ch08_03_Heanius_M_Before21,Face|Quiet, Tana. I'm trying to develop
our strategy right now...$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Before21,Face|Aha! You two showed up at the
perfect time.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ヒーニアス,ch08_03_Heanius_M_Before21,Face|...Who are you?$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Before21,Face|Heehee... The noble do not reveal
their identities so easily!$k$pThe more important matter is that
I seem to be lost... Would you be
so kind as to escort me?$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ヒーニアス,ch08_03_Heanius_M_Before21,Face|...I think not. Let's go, Tana.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Before21,Face|Hey, wait! Don't just ignore me,
a woman in need of assistance!
That's unforgivable behavior!$k$pHm? And who's this now?$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ヒーニアス,ch08_03_Heanius_M_Before21,Face|Argh! Our pursuers! It seems we have
no choice... We'll have to defeat them
before they can call reinforcements!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_幼少ターナ,ch08_05_Turner_F_Before21,Face|There's our opening! Let's make
a run for it!$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ヒーニアス,ch08_03_Heanius_M_Before21,Face|Gah! You wasted my time with your
blathering, so I couldn't strategize...
This is your fault!$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Before21,Face|And I see I was mistaken to seek any
assistance from the likes of you!$k$p$Sbs150|
